## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                 | Type                                                                                                                                                     | Default          |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------- |
| `href`   | `href`    | The href (for "link" or "link-gray" types   | `string`                                                                                                                                                 | `undefined`      |
| `target` | `target`  | The target (for "link" or "link-gray" types | `"_blank" \| "_self"`                                                                                                                                    | `"_self"`        |
| `type`   | `type`    | Title type                                  | `"text-alert-error" \| "text-alert-success" \| "text-alert-warning" \| "text-gray" \| "text-link" \| "text-link-gray" \| "text-quote" \| "text-regular"` | `"text-regular"` |
